text: Goshpur Ezra is a Gram panchayat in Hajipur, Vaishali district, Bihar. ==Geography== This panchayat is located at ==Panchayat Office== ==Nearest City/Town== Hajipur (Distance 6 km) village profile census government official website State - Bihar, District- vaishali, Sub District - Hajipur ==Nearest major road highway or river== SH 74 (State highway 74) And gandak river Map - vaishali district official government website file type: image/jpeg, size:13.9 MB ==Compass== The Chief Electoral Officer of Bihar official,hajipur pdf ==Villages in panchayat== There are villages in this panchayat.Reports of National Panchayat Directory Ministry of Panchayati Raj Government of India List of Census Villages mapped for GOSHPUR EZRA Gram Panchayat,HAJIPUR,VAISHALI,BIHAR Report printed on 26/09/2014 National Panchayat Portal,Panchayat Informatics Division {|class="wikitable" |- !s.n !villages |- | 1||Chak Shama Urf Kazi Chak |- | 2||Asdharpur |- | 3||Chak Rabia Urf Rabia Chak |- | 4||Paharpur |- | 5||Ghauspur Ijra |- | 6||Latmara |- | 7||Ijrashamain urf Molna Chak |} ==References== Category:Villages in Vaishali district Category:Vaishali district Category:Hajipur
